Designing my own collection with @ottway_thelabel ğŸ–¤

Iâ€™ve always been picky with clothing

Asking my mom & dad they would probably say that I was quite a rebel growing up never listening to what they suggested in terms of clothing haha.

I love my mom & dad for being practical but I was always wondering why it cant be both practical & esthetic at the same time? Why we canâ€™t match colors & mix comfortable with beautiful? 

A bunch of years back I found this brand I really loved called @ottway_thelabel they basically just started their journey & I really fell in love with their touch, felt like old vintage but was still new with lots of details. 

I fell in love with the founders too, Neri & Manu have this really gentle & humble way in communication. Their calmness, sense of details, quick transition to smiles & very light energy felt so close to the people I love to surround myself with, so felt really honored when they asked me to become an ambassador for their brand. 

They invited me to their wedding last year & as the only person there who never met the wedding couple in real life I felt nothing but home. It says so much about themâ¤ï¸

Now creating this collection Zephyr with Ottway feels like a dream. Itâ€™s inspired by my last years here on Ibiza. 

Zephyr is this gentle, mild breeze that touches souls with its quiet magic, just like the people I love to surround myself with. It reminds us of the simple joys that surround us each day. Itâ€™s unisex & available in two colors, Rust & White. Itâ€™s beautifully flowy & perfect for those blissful beach days we cherish here!

I will add a link to the shirts in my BIO & on my storiesğŸ–¤

Hey there! Neri and Manu here - quick thoughts from the aeroplane âœˆï¸
 
Letâ€™s take a trip back to April 2018, when OTTWAY was just starting out. 

Picture this: two rookies in fashion, working from their cabin house, launching a website with only 3 unisex shirtsâ€¦ 

It was a humble beginning, with the constant question hanging over us...

â€œWill we run out of ideas?â€

Fast forward to today, and weâ€™re writing this from an aeroplane, exhausted from 10 days of intense creativity secluded in the mountains of China, designing new collections.

The good news? Weâ€™re full of exciting ideas, projects, and epic new designs

The bad news? After starting with just 3 designs, we never thought we were going to run out of space!

Despite producing always in small batches, every design needs its own space, and we need to make some room in our Collingwood warehouse to welcome the new pieces! 

As a thank you for being part of our journey, weâ€™re giving our community 20%-50% off on over 30 timeless designs.

Once theyâ€™re gone, theyâ€™re gone! Donâ€™t miss out!

Let's raise awareness and conserve our beautiful Earth ğŸ¤

In the lead up to Earth Day next week (22nd April), weâ€™re encouraging you guys to spend more time outside and to take your work (if possible) outdoors for as long or little as you like!

It could look like:
- An entire day, morning or afternoon setup by the local park
- A phone call or meeting walking outdoors instead of the office
- Your lunch break spent outside, in a local park, a dip at the local beach or in your garden.
*Go a step further and remove all distractions and turn your phone off

OUR BELIEF IS: If people could just for one day or one moment, put aside some time within their regular routine to be in nature, to acknowledge and appreciate it, then we believe Earth Day is being utilised for what itâ€™s meant for; to raise awareness and to conserve out beautiful Earth

How to get involved & join the Less Worries, More Nature club!
*by doing so you can get an OTTWAY limited edition, not-for-sale Nature Cap with your next Ottway purchase! 

This week, on Earth Day or any day after, MAKE A PLAN to spend time in nature outside of your normal routine. (Some tips below)

Take a pic or film a video to encourage others to participate and share it! Tag us or use the hashtag #LessWorriesMoreNature and weâ€™ll repost it to share the message too! THEN SEND YOU A UNIQUE CODE to get a FREE Nature Cap with your next purchase (as seen in this reel)

GO EVEN FURTHER: get inspired, step out into nature and use this audio on a reel to spread the concept even more!

Have you met GLORIA? ğŸšŒ
Our 40ft 1970â€™s school bus helped us become self sustainable after many hard working years renovating this beauty out in the Otway Ranges ğŸ¤

A strong point to being off-grid meant harvesting our own water and food. We collect water from the a-frame cabin roof and it fills a 5,000L tank which can be filtered and used for drinking and in the kitchen. Another addition is the 3x3 bathroom with a composting toilet and we use electricity from the solar panels to pump the water into the shower! 

We are super proud. 
A dream to reconnect with nature â€¦

INTRODUCING six textured, unique and timeless designs inspired from the landscape and culture of Morocco

A recap of another crazy year at Ottway! 
2022 saw some big steps, big moves and an even bigger Ottway community! Every bit of it made possible because of your guys constant support and trust in us!
SO THANK YOU! ğŸ–¤
To name some of the stand outs, this years highlights were;
- Hitting an amazing community of 100K on here
- Living an entire month off-grid in our converted school bus and tiny home; Gloria ğŸšŒ
- Launching and releasing a year long, 4 chapter campaign called â€œArt Of Livingâ€ where it took us full time into Ottway, escaping the ordinary at Gloria, across the world into the German wilderness, returning home and finding new appreciation for Melbourne and finally, chasing the dream of relocating to Byron Bay and setting up a new beginning! All inspired from our moto that â€œLife is for Livingâ€ and that there is an art to it! 
- Upgrading our Melbourne Flagship store to be double the size and launching the Byron Bay Cabin Store!
- Installing another 200 solar panels as part of our Solo Sunny Days sustainability Program

But above all, feeling more inspired, grateful and driven to keep this Ottway story going. Spreading our will for adventure, creativity, true craftsmanship and appreciation for old traditions!
Thanks for being a part of the journey and have a happy ne year!! Life is for Living!

CHAPTER 1: Re-designing Life IS OFFICIALLY LIVE & ONLINE!
Introducing the
Yamba & Rossana dresses,
and the Jasper Cream & Brown.

Inspired by the necessity of simple, laid back living mixed with the comfort and style of easy wearing to match. It has always been about creating that balance between style, comfort and practicality, all the while feeling good and inspired to make the most of our days.
These four designs embody just that, and we hope they inspire you all to re-design your life into exactly how you imagine it!

The first chapter for us has been packing/selling everything and leaving the city life behind, going full time into our dream & mission: Ottway The Label and spending an entire month off grid at our sanctuary in the Otway Ranges, Gloria! ğŸšŒ

NOT JUST A HAPPY NEW YEARS!

As we sit here writing our 4th Happy New Years message, we can't help but reflect on all the good times that have been. We've continued to build our community and more than ever we appreciate how much you all mean to Ottway. Without your ongoing support and belief in this story, it wouldn't exist at all!

With this first post of 2022, we want to leave you with a positive note to take into the new year.

Hey fam! Today is an important day for Ottway and the rest of the world! It marks International Day Of Climate Action and we have a message we want to spread far and wide, which truly hits close to home!

Recently, we were connected with climate change tackling organisation @surfersforclimate who filled us in on a recent devastating government released proposal which saw 31,000sq Km of pristine ocean to be sold off to the highest bidder for gas exploration in our backyard and the area which is the very inspiration for this project, The Otwayâ€™s.

As part of our action on this important day, we want to spread this news to as many people as possible and aid @surfersforclimate in collecting signatures for an opposing petition.

WE NEED YOUR HELP! Click the link in our story and add your signature, then to help us spread this message, share this post to your stories. For every share we will donate $1 to @surfersforchange so that they can continue to kick gas out of the line-up and protect our oceanic backyard!

HELP US PROTECT OUR BACKYARD!
Share this post and sign the petition!

We chose to not let 2020 be a year to forget, but rather one to remember!

The Westward venturing out for a morning dip ğŸŒŠ ğŸ“· @nathan.lapham

â€œMore often than not, sunsets over west are always unforgettable. There is something magical about the sun setting directly over the coastlines horizon. The water sparkles in a hued warmth and that moment seconds before the sun dips away, when it luminates at its largest, spreading an array of colours across the sky, filled us too with warmth and joy. It fell perfectly for my last night here. A group of close friends grabbed their cameras, a couch and we sat up on our favourite rooftop looking over the main street of Fremantle. Reminiscing on what a summer it had been, and cheersâ€™ing to many more of these good timesâ€
Last night over West - A story and words by @journal_of_jian

Fremantle Cabin Session Update ğŸ“» Dear West Coast Ottway Crew, we are sure you are well aware of the current COVID-19 pandemic which is affecting the world. It is a hot topic flooding our lives and for many beginning to have an impact.

Here at Ottway the Label we have our customers - you guys - at the priority of our thoughts. We want to give you all an incredible, fun, memorable experience of live music and the Ottway lifestyle. With our upcoming cabin session event next Friday the 27th March, the current precautionary measures being taken to ensure the prevention of spreading the virus, has given us some concern for the likelihood of this event occurring.

At this stage, unfortunately, the event is going to be POSTPONED. We care deeply for the enjoyment and safety of you guys. This session was something we were looking very forward to... The event is going to be moved to a later, safer, date and of course, full refunds will be issued and previous ticket purchasers will be notified first of the new date.  For now, stay tuned for further notice and take care of each other!

After several months working on our sustainability program, we are very happy to finally share it with you all. 
Being a small business, we have been assessing different angles to find the most efficient way of providing a positive impact to the community. 
Renewable energy, and more specifically Solar Energy, is what originally brought us to Australia. 
At OTTWAY, we are proud to promote a sustainable future by donating funds from every purchase towards the installation of solar power in community-owned projects around Australia. 
Thank you for your contribution so far, check our full sustainability program on our website and see what we have already achieved together. #cleanenergy #sustainability #yourcontribution #solarenergy #renewableenergy #community

Environment: A non-negotiable agenda

Ever since coal was partnered with water to generate steam and launch the industrial revolution, we have been pouring billions of tons of atmospheric warming compounds into the planetâ€™s atmosphere. While scientists were aware of the climate-altering potential of burning hydrocarbons as early as 1896, the wealth generated by spinning jennies, power looms, and drop forges was seductive, as was the power it gave countries to build colonial empires and subjugate populations across the globe.

But the bill is finally coming due. 
At Ottway, we are committed to being part of a sustainable future and we have been working hard to implement an innovative and powerful giving back program that will be in place in the next coming weeks.

#climatechange #renewableenergy

Everything comes and goes, but nostalgia is hitting hard right nowâ€¦ The Ottway Cabin is sadly about to be demolished to give rise to brand new apartments. 
This unique nook means a lot to us, as it has not only been home for the last few years but also source of inspiration and birthplace for this project. We canâ€™t be anything, but forever happy to all the good times and memories shared with all of youâ€¦ 
During a time of high-speed urban, technological and de-humanization evolution, at Ottway we believe in preserving our past and re-connecting with nature. 
There are certain things in this world that money canâ€™t buy. One of them is the ability to turn a vision into reality. We once dreamt of taking The Ottway Cabin into its natural environment, the Otway Rangesâ€¦and its happening!! We are going off-the-grid in the heart of the Otways, and rebuilding The Ottway Cabin on top of a 50 passenger school bus with the pieces of the original cabin before its demolished. To not only remember and record but also to celebrate with our people. It is going to be an epic journey, canâ€™t wait to share it with you all... Thanks everyone for bringing the best vibes to our Cabin! ğŸ–¤

Pacific Diary | Now Available âš“ï¸ Seafarers, ordinary men living extraordinary lives, subject to dangers and difficulties we could only imagine. The image of the true sea dog, the old salt, has something of the ultimate man, the first and last about it. We do not see sea captains these days.
